carouselDescription.point: 5 large fenced in play areas designated for different age groups
Sanbox used for sensory motor skills
Fish Tank that is regulated daily

dropdownData.title: Encouraging Individual Growth
dropdownData.description: We believe each individual child will unfold his or her personality and abilities in time. Our program encourages this unfolding in an environment that is rich in nurturing, understanding, and learning.

dropdownData.title: Comprehensive Learning Program
dropdownData.description: Brighter Beginnings Preschool/Child Care Center offers an independent early childhood program packed with educational experiences for young children. Our program promotes the physical, emotional, and intellectual development of children.

dropdownData.title: Holistic Child Development
dropdownData.description: We carefully planned this program in such a way so as to enhance your childâ€™s total development. Our program is based on monthly themes, webs, and emergent curriculum that encourage a wide variety of experiences and self-expression.
